content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I didn't agree on a final price because I believed we could still get a higher price for the apartment given the prime location and high demand in the city center area.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner Emilia Müller at 8. There was a clear disagreement on the rental price, but the interaction was respectful and professional.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended because the disagreement was not personal and was strictly about the rental price of the apartment. Emilia Müller maintained a respectful and professional demeanor throughout the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
